text: inamen se jisako (jab) chaaho alag kar do aur jisako (jab tak) chaaho apane paas rakho aur jin auraton ko tumane alag kar diya tha agar phir tum unake khvaaho ho to bhee tum par koee mazaeqa nahin hai ye (akhateyaar jo tumako diya gaya hai) zaroor is qaabil hai ki tumhaaree beeviyon kee onkhen thandee rahe aur aarjooda khaatir na ho aur vo kuchh tum unhen de do sabakee sab us par raazee rahen aur jo kuchh tumhaare dilon mein hai khuda usako khub jaanata hai aur khuda to bada vaaqiphakaar burdabaar hai
